verses.roman:
alpa vayasa tāṅra, rājāra kumāra
'rāmadāsa' ādi pāṭhāna--cākara tāṅhāra

synonyms: alpa vayasa tāṅra—his age is very young; rājāra kumāra—son of the king; rāmadāsa—Rāmadāsa; ādi—heading the list; pāṭhāna—the Mohammedans; cākara tāṅhāra—servants of him.
translation: Vijulī Khān was very young, and he was the son of the king. All the other Mohammedans, Pāṭhānas, headed by Rāmadāsa, were his servants.
